_header: Pride of heart and high bearing
Note: Attributed in the MS to Augustine.
_description: Four evils to which those not tempted are susceptible — one monorhyming quatrain translating ‘Cordis eleuacio mentis et corporis vagacio’ which is written to its left in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Pride of herte & hey beringgeOf þi time euel
                    spendinggeOf oþeres dedis misdemingge& of is owen
                    vnkuningge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 63.
